uk.ac.soton.itinnovation.sad.service.helpers

Class CoordinatorHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.soton.itinnovation.sad.service.helpers.CoordinatorHelper

  • @Service
public class CoordinatorHelper
extends Object
    Ensures only one Coordinator instance is in use by the SAD Service.

    • Method Detail

      • getCoordinator

        public Coordinator getCoordinator(String pathToConfigurationFile,
                         boolean doDatabaseReset)
        Returns SAD Coordinator instance.
        Parameters:
        pathToConfigurationFile - location of the database configuration file.
        doDatabaseReset - if to wipe the database completely on init.
        Returns:
        the instance of the SAD coordinator in use.

      • getStaticCoordinator

        public Coordinator getStaticCoordinator(String pathToConfigurationFile,
                               boolean doDatabaseReset)
        Ensures only one instance of the Coordinator is used by the service.
        Parameters:
        pathToConfigurationFile - location of the database configuration file.
        doDatabaseReset - if to wipe the database completely on init.
        Returns:
        new coordinator if it doesn't exist.
